text: The Sure Thing is a 1985 American romantic adventure comedy movie directed by Rob Reiner and starring John Cusack, Daphne Zuniga, Nicollette Sheridan, Viveca Lindfors, Anthony Edwards, Tim Robbins. It was distributed by Embassy Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1985 adventure movies Category:1985 romantic comedy movies Category:1980s road movies Category:1980s teen comedy movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American road movies Category:American teen comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Rob Reiner
title: The Sure Thing
